Angela Ndambuki (a mụrụ n'afọ 1980), bụ onye ọka iwu Kenya na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ
A họpụtara ya dịka onye isi mpaghara nke International Federation of the Phonographic Industry (IFPI) maka Sub-Saharan Africa, malite na 1 Julaị 2020
Ọ na-ahụ maka mba iri anọ na isii, nke dị na Nairobi, isi obodo Kenya na obodo kachasị ukwuu.

Tupu nke ahụ, site na Septemba afọ 2017 ruo June afọ 2020, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi ọrụ (CEO) nke Kenya National Chamber of Commerce and Industry. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Performers Rights Society of Kenya (PRISK).
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-edekọ egwu, ọ bụkwa onye otu ụmụ agbọghọ niile a na-akpọ Tatuu
Ndị otu ahụ mechara kewaa ka ha rụọ ọrụ n'otu n'otu.
A mụrụ Angela na Mombasa, Kenya n'ihe dịka n'afọ 1980, ma ọ gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ obodo maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị. O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke iwu (LLB) na Mahadum nke Nairobi
O nwekwara diplọma Postgraduate na Iwu (Dip.Iwu), nke Kenya School of Law nyere
Ọ bụ onye otu Kenya Bar
O nwetara nzere Master of Laws (LLM) ọkachamara na ikike ikike ọgụgụ isi, na Mahadum nke Edinburgh, na Scotland.
N'afọ 1998, Angela Ndambuki zutere Debbie Asila na nke mbụ ya
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ zutere Angela Mwandanda
Ha niile nwere mmasị ịrụ ọrụ
Ha atọ ghọrọ enyi ma malite imekọ ihe nkiri ọnụ, gụnyere na French Cultural Centre na British Council na Nairobi, isi obodo Kenya.
Mgbe ọ gafechara ule ndị ọka iwu, ya na ndị ọzọ hiwere Performers Rights Society of Kenya (PRISK)
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Standard (Kenya) n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2015, Angela na-ekwu na ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ abụọ n'enweghị ụgwọ ọrụ mgbe ọ na-ejikọta ọha mmadụ ọnụ
Ọ gbagoro n'ọkwa General Manager site na Jenụwarị 2009, na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo Ọktọba afọ 2012
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2012, a kwalitere ya n'ọkwa onye isi na PRISK, na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo Septemba afọ 2017.
Angela Ndambuki lụrụ Roy, ha bụ nne na nna nke ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
A mụrụ nwa nwanyị nke okenye n'ihe dịka afọ 2007 ma mụọ nke nta n'ihe dịka afọ 2013.
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2017, a kpọrọ ya aha n'etiti "Top 40 Women Under 40 In Kenya 2017", site n'aka akwụkwọ akụkọ Business Daily Africa, nke dị na Nairobi, Kenya ma Nation Media Group bipụtara.
